articles.title: Cricket SA's Edward Khoza: 2015 Zondo non-selection was unfair, but not race-based
articles.description: Cricket South Africa's acting head of pathways Edward Khoza said Khaya Zondo's 2015 axing on the tour of India was unfair, but not race-based.
articles.content:
• Cricket South Africa's acting head of pathways Edward Khoza said Khaya Zondo not playing in the 2015 ODI against India wasn't race-based.
